232102.「どんなことを 聞きますか？\n<break>:
What do you want to hear about?
<break>

232104.「マイタウンは 一定額のゴールドでの購入か\n 『マイタウン権利証・封書』で\n:
My Town is a large living area that can be created by purchasing a certain amount of gold or by using "Sealed My Town Deed"! You can
change the landscape, environment, and sky conditions, set the time of day, place garden furniture along the streets, and even have a
house to use as a base! However, there are some towns where you cannot change the landscape or environment! You can also change
the position of the staff of various facilities in My Town, so you can open a store anywhere you like! You can decorate your large
town together with your friends or invite many people to your events!

232106.「マイタウンは 一定額のゴールドでの購入か\n 『マイタウン権利証・封書』を 消:
You can buy a My Town with a certain amount of gold or by consuming a "Sealed My Town Deed", but we don't accept them here!
"Land Manager Listeah" in the North Port Lendor is accepting purchases, so please ask there!

232108.「こんにちは！\n こちらは マイタウンの サポート窓口です！\n どういった:
Hello! This is the My Town support desk! How
may I help you?
<break>

232110.「ほかに ご用はありますか？\n<break>:
Is there anything else I can do for you?
<break>

232112.「マイタウンに 関することでしたら\n いつでも 声をかけてくださいね！:
If you have any questions about My Town,
please feel free to contact us!

232114.「<pc>さんが 今 訪問ができる\n マイタウンを 探します！\n どの方法で:
You want to visit a My Town? How would you
like to search for one?
<break>

232116.「このマイタウンへ 移動しますか？\n<yesno><break>:
Do you want to move to this My Town?
<yesno><break>
<yesno><break>

I can't find a My Town that matches your
search criteria. Please try again.
<break>

232120.「探したい マイタウンＩＤを\n 入力してください！\n<break>:
Please enter the My Town ID you're looking
for.
<break>

I'm displaying the My Town with the ID
<%sL_MYTOWN_ID>-<%sL_MYTOWN_ID2>!
<break>

232124.「はい！\n それでは 移動しちゃいますよ！\n<br>\n「ええーい！\n ケ:
Yes! Then, let's go!
Yeah! Nwot ym ot～ylf s'tel!

enjoy Astoltia's unique and fulfilling lifestyle.

232208.「マイタウンは 一定額のゴールドでの購入か\n 『マイタウン権利証・封書』で\n:
My Town is a large living area that can be created by purchasing a certain amount of gold or by using the "Sealed My Town Deed". You can
change the landscape and environment, set the time of day, place garden furniture along the streets, and even have a home base. In My
Town, you can change the position of the staff at various facilities, so you can open a store anywhere you like. My Town allows you to
create your own unique atmosphere in a large town, or to invite many people to an event.

232210.「マイタウンの ご購入については\n こちらで 受け付けております。\n<br>:
My Town Deed is available for purchase here. You can purchase a Sealed My Town Deed by paying a certain amount of gold or by bringing
a "Sealed My Town Deed" to us. If you would like to purchase a Sealed My Town Deed, please select the "Create My Town" option and choose
which method you would like to use. The "Sealed My Town Deed" is an item that can be sold at Traveler's Bazaar, although there are
various ways to obtain it. You will also receive a certificate of title and a sealed envelope when you collect 1,000 My Town Medal
medals.

232238.「購入前の 確認ですが\n 拠点として利用できる マイタウンは\n おひとり様:
Before purchasing, please note that you can only use one My Town per person as your base of operations. You will have a new home
address in My Town, so if you have a home in residences, you will need to move to My Town. Baton-chan will not be coming to My Town, so
if you have not received your gift yet, we recommend that you do so before making your purchase.

232240.「ご購入を やめられるのですね。\n よく検討してからでも よいと思いますよ。:

purchase. I think it's okay to do so after
careful consideration.

232242.「マイタウンが 完成しました。\n <pc>さんの\n マイタウン情報は こちら:
My Town is now complete. My Town support for is here, and I have added "My Town Deed" to the Key Items as the owner
of the land in My Town. In order to use the My Town functionality, you need to set up a home in one of the My Town land signs. Once you
have entered My Town, you must first check one of the signs to determine the land that will be your "main residence". Then, you can use
the function.

You have purchased <%sM_Region_Name>. You have
purchased <%sM_Region_Name>, which gives you
access to all of the features of My Town.
<bw_break>

299815.「<%sM_Region_Name>の ご購入ですね。\n この町では マイタウ:
You are purchasing <%sM_Region_Name>. Please note that some of the My Town features are restricted in this town. Specifically, you
will not be able to change the "Distant View" and "Landscape" settings in the "Appearance Settings" section.

299821.「権利証・封書の種類には\n 『マイタウン権利証・封書』と\n 町ごとの専用権利:
There are two types of deeds: "Sealed My Town Deed" and town-specific deeds. The Sealed My Town Deed is an item that can be used to
purchase any town, and can be sold in the bazaar or traded. Please note that the exclusive Deed cannot be sold in the bazaar or
traded, and cannot be transferred to other characters.

299822.「権利証・封書の種類には\n 『マイタウン権利証・封書』と\n 町ごとの専用権利:
There are two types of deeds: "Sealed My Town Deed" and town-specific deeds. The Sealed My Town Deed is an item that can be used to
purchase any town, and can be sold in the bazaar or traded. Please note that the exclusive Deed cannot be sold in the bazaar or
traded, and cannot be transferred to other characters.

299823.「権利証・封書の種類には\n 『マイタウン権利証・封書』と\n 町ごとの専用権利:
There are two types of deeds: "Sealed My Town Deed" and town-specific deeds. The exclusive deed and seal with the name of each town can
be used to purchase that town. Please note that the exclusive Deed cannot be sold in the bazaar or traded, and cannot be transferred to
other characters.

299824.「権利証・封書の種類には\n 『マイタウン権利証・封書』と\n 町ごとの専用権利:
There are two types of deeds: "Sealed My Town Deed" and town-specific deeds. The Sealed My Town Deed is an item that can be used to
purchase any town, and can be listed in the bazaar or traded. Please note that the exclusive Deed is not transferable to other
characters, and cannot be sold or traded in the bazaar.

299825.「権利証・封書の種類には\n 『マイタウン権利証・封書』と\n 町ごとの専用権利:
There are two types of deeds: "Sealed My Town Deed" and a town-specific deed! Sealed My Town Deed is an item that can be used to purchase
any town and can be used to sell in the bazaar or trade! Please note that the exclusive vouchers cannot be sold in the bazaar or
traded, and are not transferable to other characters!

299826.「権利証・封書の種類には\n 『マイタウン権利証・封書』と\n 町ごとの専用権利:
There are two types of deeds: "Sealed My Town Deed" and town-specific deeds. The Sealed My Town Deed is an item that can be used to
purchase any town and can be sold in the bazaar or traded. Please note that the exclusive Deed is not transferable to other
characters, and cannot be sold or traded in the bazaar.

299827.「マイタウンの町には マイタウンの機能を\n すべて 利用できる町と\n 一部の:
Some My Town towns have full My Town functionality, while others have limited functionality. In "Hill Town," all My Town
features are available, but in other towns there are some restrictions. For example, you cannot change the "Distant View" and
"Landscape" settings in the "Appearance Settings" section.
